article_title: MORNING BRO: PETA thinks this girl deserved to get mauled?
article_text:
A screengrab from the Florida Bowfishing Charters Bikini Bowfishing Team DVD, available at www.bikinibowfishing.com.

4028470

It’s been a sick week. First, PETA said that a young girl who got mauled by a bear deserved it for hunting. And as if that wasn’t enough, Michelle Obama entered the Obamacare fray with a poorly written op-ed and instructions on how to bother your neighbor (a theme with this administration).

Oh, and the NSA is sad that foreigners don’t trust our spies, or something.

But at least TheDC’s Vince Coglianese, Patrick Howley, Lauren Patterson and Christopher Bedford aren’t having any of it.

Follow The Daily Caller on Twitter
